about.description: ZentraFlix is a fork of movie-web that is ensured to stay up even after the shutdown of movie-web.app. ZentraFlix runs on a private, self-hosted VPS. I run this site at a loss; there are very minimal ads due to my beliefs in free media.
about.help: Can't find an answer? <0>Get support here.</0>

q1.title: Where does the content come from?
q1.body: ZentraFlix does not host any content. When you click on something to watch, the internet is searched for the selected media (On the loading screen and in the 'video sources' tab you can see which source you're using). Media never gets uploaded by ZentraFlix, everything is through this searching mechanism.

q2.title: Where can I request a show or movie?
q2.body: It's not possible to request a show or movie, ZentraFlix does not manage any content. All content is viewed through sources on the internet.

q3.title: The search results display the show or movie, why can't I play it?
q3.body: Our search results are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB) and display regardless of whether our sources actually have the content.

q4.title: What about my data and stuff?
q4.body: All data is synced to the community backend, anyone is free to use this as well.

q5.title: How can I find out more?
q5.body: ZentraFlix has a Telegram server that can be found at the header of this page!

q6.title: Is there a ZentraFlix app?
q6.body: Not yet, but you can install it as a PWA (Progressive Web App). On iOS, use Safari ‚Üí Share ‚Üí Add to Home Screen. On Android, use Chrome ‚Üí 3 dots ‚Üí Add to Home Screen. An experimental APK is available via our Telegram, but it's not recommended.

q7.title: How do I make an account?
q7.body: Tap "Sync to Cloud" in the dropdown menu or go to Settings to create and sync a community account.

q9.title: This media is missing / Can I request media?
q9.body: No‚Äîsince we don't host content, we cannot add or change what's available. The content list is based on what's publicly accessible through the search mechanism.

q10.title: I can't find the movie/show I'm searching for!
q10.body: TMDB powers our search. Try tapping the üîé icon for advanced search options if results aren't accurate.

q11.title: Why am I seeing a black screen?
q11.body: Likely a corrupt or broken video file. Try switching sources.

q12.title: The episode I'm watching is incorrect.
q12.body: Switch to a different source. We don't control any content or episode accuracy.

q13.title: The video quality isn't what I expected.
q13.body: Try switching sources. Quality varies by provider; FED API often offers more options.

q14.title: 4K isn't available.
q14.body: If 4K is not shown, it's likely unavailable from that source.

q15.title: Why is there no audio?
q15.body: Ensure your device isn't muted and try switching sources. Audio issues may be source-specific.

q16.title: The video is tinted or washed out.
q16.body: Could be a faulty file or an HDR video. Ensure your device supports HDR, or switch sources.

q17.title: I'm experiencing visual glitches.
q17.body: Visual bugs usually come from poor file uploads. Try switching sources.

q18.title: The source is loading slowly.
q18.body: Speed depends on the hosting site. Switch to another source for better performance.

q19.title: How do I switch sources?
q19.body: While playing, tap the ‚öôÔ∏è icon, then choose another source under "video sources".

q20.title: What is FED API?
q20.body: FED API is our private scraper that pulls streams directly from Febbox. Each free Febbox account includes 100 GB/month of unlimited bandwidth, and we use your UI token to scrape content as if you're watching it yourself. Setup is easiest via desktop browser, but mobile instructions are available on our Telegram.

q21.title: Does FED API work on all devices?
q21.body: Yes. Once set up, your token works across all logged-in devices.

q22.title: Why do I need the extension or custom proxy?
q22.body: Some sources block scrapers. The extension acts like a local proxy and bypasses such blocks using your IP, headers, and cookies.

q23.title: What is the extension? Is it safe?
q23.body: It's a local proxy tool used to access streams that restrict scrapers. It mimics your browsing session. It's also completly opensource and can be found on our github.

q24.title: My febbox token fails during setup. What should I do?
q24.body: Your ISP might be blocking FED API. Set a custom DNS like 1.1.1.1 or NextDNS. You can also change your region in the admin panel.

q25.title: How do I change languages?
q25.body: We prioritize English, but some sources offer other languages. Try switching sources. For FED API, only Safari supports audio switching in MP4 files.

q26.title: My subtitles aren't in sync.
q26.body: Use the "Customize" option in subtitle settings or tap [ and ] on your keyboard to adjust. You can also upload your own subtitle file.

start.title: Migrate your data
start.explainer: If you wish to migrate or backup your data, you can do so using the options below. This will allow you to keep your data when you switch backend servers.

direct.description:
This will directly migrate your data to the new server. This is the fastest option.

This option allows you to keep your passphrase the same!

download.description: This will download your data to your device. You can then upload it to the new server or just keep it for safekeeping.

start.explainer: To get the best streams possible, you will need to choose which streaming method you want to use.

explainer.intro: ZentraFlix doesn't host videos. It relies on third-party websites for content, so you need to choose how it connects to those sites.
explainer.extensionDescription: The extension gives you access to the most sources. It acts as a local proxy and can handle sites that need special cookies or headers to load.
explainer.proxyDescription: The proxy scrapes media from other websites. It bypasses browser restrictions (like CORS) to allow scraping.
explainer.defaultDescription: Uses ZentraFlix's built-in proxy. It's the easiest option but might be slower due to shared bandwidth.

fedapi.fedapiDescription: Bring your own FREE Febbox account to gain access to FED API (Private), the best source with 4K quality, Dolby Atmos, skip intro and the fastest load times! Highly recommended option!

explainer.outro: If you have more questions on how this works, feel free to ask on the <0>ZentraFlix Telegram</0> server!

default.text: I don't want good quality streams, use the default setup.

extensionFailure.title: Please enable the extension
extensionFailure.text: You've installed the ZentraFlix extension. To start using it, you need to enable the extension for this site.

tips.1: Tap the gear icon to switch sources!
tips.2: Tap the title to copy the link!
tips.3: Tap and hold or hold SHIFT to show widescreen button instead of fullscreen!
tips.4: Some sources work better than others!
tips.5: Get the extension for more sources!
tips.6: Hold bookmarks to edit or delete them!
tips.7: Hold SHIFT and tap the title to copy the link with time!
tips.9: Migrate your account to a new backend in settings!
tips.11: Use [ and ] to adjust subtitle timing!
tips.12: Press SPACE or K to play/pause!
tips.13: Use LEFT and RIGHT arrow keys to skip 5 seconds!
tips.14: Use J and L keys to skip 10 seconds!
tips.17: Use UP and DOWN arrows to change volume!
tips.18: Press < and > to change playback speed!
tips.19: Press . and , to move frame by frame when paused!
tips.21: Press R to do a barrel roll!

turnstile.description: Please prove your humanity by completing the quick challenge, this is to keep ZentraFlix safe.
turnstile.error: Failed to verify your humanity - stream failed to load. Clear your cache and try again, or switch to a different source (tap the gear).
turnstile.title: Are You a Robot ü§ñ?

support.title: Support
support.text: ZentraFlix is designed to be as user-friendly as possible. However, people still have questions and issues. This page is here to help resolve these shortcomings

q1.body: Well, you can join the official <0>ZentraFlix discord</0> and ask questions there or you can email the one provided at the bottom of this page.
q1.title: Where can I get help?

q2.body: We have a <0>GitHub</0> where you can create a detailed issue in our repository. Additionally, if you wish, you can create a pull request to fix the issue yourself.
q2.title: How can I report a bug or issue?

jip.title: Jip
jip.text: ZentraFlix didn't fall out of a coconut tree, it was made mostly by a single person (a very epic one at that).

q1.body: Well, you can join the official <0>ZentraFlix discord</0> and ask questions there or you can email the one provided at the bottom of this page.
q1.title: Where can I get help?

q2.body: We have a <0>GitHub</0> where you can create a detailed issue in our repository. Additionally, if you wish, you can create a pull request to fix the issue yourself.
q2.title: How can I report a bug or issue?

options.discoverDescription: Show the Discover section on the Homepage below your bookmarked media. Enabled by default.
options.featuredDescription: Show a carousel of featured movies and shows at the top of your homepage! Disabled by default.
options.modalDescription: Show the details modal when you click on a media card instead of going to the watch page. Proxy or Extension required for trailer. Disabled by default.
options.logosDescription: Show image logos instead of text titles in the details modal and featured section. Enabled by default.
options.logosNotice: Most of the time, logos are English only. Other languages might want to disable this!
options.carouselViewDescription: Display your currently watching and bookmark sections as carousels instead of a grid. Disabled by default.
options.forceCompactEpisodeViewDescription: Force the episode carousel in the player to use the "classic" compact vertical view. Disabled by default.

server.description: If you would like to connect to a custom backend to store your data, enable this and provide the URL. <0>Instructions.</0>

workers.emptyState: No workers yet (ÔΩ°‚Ä¢ÃÅÔ∏ø‚Ä¢ÃÄÔΩ°), add one below
workers.label: Use custom proxy workers

proxyTMDB.title: Proxy TMDB
proxyTMDB.description: Only needed if you can't access TheMovieDB directly, such as if your ISP blocks it. It is recomended to disable the Discover section to improve performance with this.

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.languageDescription: Language applied to the entire application, only English has silly stuff üôÅ.
preferences.thumbnailDescription: Most of the time, videos don't have thumbnails. You can enable this setting to generate them on the fly but they can make your video slower.
preferences.autoplayDescription: Automatically play the next episode in a series after reaching the end. Can be enabled by users with the browser extension, a custom proxy, or with the default setup if allowed by the host.
preferences.skipCreditsDescription: When enabled, automatically play the next episode at 99% completion to skip end credits. When disabled, wait until the episode is fully completed.
preferences.lowPerformanceModeDescription: Optimizes the application for slower connections and devices by disabling bandwidth-heavy features. This mode reduces data usage and improves performance while keeping the core search and watch functionality intact.
preferences.sourceOrderDescription:
Drag and drop to reorder sources. This will determine the order in which sources are checked for the media you are trying to watch. If a source is greyed out, it means the extension is required for that source.

(The default order is best for most users)

onboarding.title: Febbox token
onboarding.description: Bring your own FREE Febbox account to gain access to exclusive sources! The best sources with 4K quality, Dolby Atmos, skip intro and the fastest load times! Highly recommended option!

step.1: 1. Go to <0>febbox.com</0> and log in with Google (use a fresh account!)
step.2: 2. Open DevTools or inspect the page
step.5: 5. Close the tab, but do NOT logout!
